about_the_game:
Saga of Elster Land:The Destruction Crystal is a Western Style Fantasy RPG. Enter the world of Elsterland and you are going to have an epic adventure with colorful cast of characters. Manage your team, take the challenge then enter the dungeon.

"Dungeon of Dragon Knight"Universe

The story of this game's predecessor, Dungeon of Dragon Knight, takes place in the Lunar Era of 1158. The wicked witch Lula deceived players into defeating the virtuous elven knight Soren, obtaining the powerful artifact "Destruction Crystal", summoning countless demons from hell, and occupying human territory. The benevolent races entered a dark age.

Background of the Story

One hundred years later, both the witch Lula and the "Crystal of Destruction" have vanished, plunging the entire continent into chaos. Since the witch took away the Crystal of Destruction, the land has witnessed six total eclipses. A prophecy claims that during the seventh total eclipse, a hero will rise, find the Crystal of Destruction, and send the demons back to hell. Evil forces are also following this prophecy, searching for the hero to eliminate them before the prophecy comes true.

Features
  • A real-time combat system that allows players to strategically deploy their troops.
  • Solve the puzzle, avoid the trap and you will discover hidden treasure.
  • Unravel the secrets of the Elsterland gradually during exploration.
